item.description:
As promised, here comes round two of "Cocktail Hour" at Diva Lounge in Davis Square.

Located next door to Diva Indian restaurant, Diva lounge has a unique, swanky decor (check out the picture) that should help everyone to feel shaken, not stirred. In addition to a great drink menu, they serve a delicious assortment of $1 Indian Tapas dishes for snacking.

Our first event at Diva Lounge was a big success. The drinks are very original with a distinct Indian flair. The "Shiva" was my favorite. The atmosphere is just right for good conversation. If you made it to the first Diva Lounge event, you know what I mean. If you missed it the first time around, now is your chance to check it out.

The place is a bit small so I'm limiting the RSVP's this time and no "Maybe's". Sorry about that :-) I'll make sure to reserve the front booth this time too!

I hope to see you there!

Patrick
item.name: Cocktails at Diva Lounge in Davis Square
